name: Tim Cook
role: Chief Executive Officer of Apple Inc.
quote: Being gay is one of the greatest gifts God has given me.

name: Elliot Page
role: Actor and Producer; Co-founder of Transgender Media
quote: I’m trans, my name is Elliot, and my pronouns are he/they.

name: Lydia X. Z. Brown
role: Tech Consultant and Activist
quote: We deserve all the rights, all the time.

name: Sophie Wilson
role: computer scientist
quote: I think it's important to be open about who you are.

name: Megan Smith
role: Former U.S. CTO; CEO of Shift7
quote: Diversity and inclusion are keys to innovation.

name: Edith Windsor
role: Computer programmer and engineer at IBM
quote: Marriage is a magic word; it has magic throughout the world. It has to do with our dignity as human beings, to be who we are openly.

name: Coraline Ada Ehmke
role: Software Developer; Creator of the Contributor Covenant
quote: Ethics and social justice are as important as the code itself.

name: Kara Swisher
role: Tech Journalist and Co-founder of Recode
quote: There’s nothing wrong with being gay, and there’s nothing wrong with being a journalist who’s gay.

name: Chelsea Manning
role: Whistleblower and Trans Rights Activist
quote: I believe we have more power than we think we do.

name: Chris Hughes
role: Co-founder of Facebook
quote: I’m gay, and I’m an entrepreneur.

name: Aydian Dowling
role: Entrepreneur and Trans Advocate
quote: I’m humble enough to know I’m far from finished.

name: Alan Turing
role: British mathematician and logician, considered the father of theoretical computer science and artificial intelligence.
quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

name: Jon maddog Hall
role: Board chair for the Linux Professional Institute
quote: I am who I am, and I am proud of who I am.

name: Leanne Pittsford
role: Founder of Lesbians Who Tech
quote: We have to create the spaces we want to see in the world.

name: Bruce Bastian
role: Co-creator of WordPerfect
quote: I realized that being true to myself was more important than conforming to someone else's idea of who I should be.

name: Audrey Tang
role: Digital Minister of Taiwan
quote: In the digital age, democracy can be more than just voting; it can be a conversation.

name: Angelica Ross
role: Founder and CEO of TransTech Social Enterprises
quote: I believe that telling our stories, first to ourselves and then to one another and the world, is a revolutionary act.

name: Charlie Sprinkman
role: Creator of the Everywhere Is Queer app
quote: I wanted to create a resource that makes it easier for queer people to find and support each other.

name: Ann Mei Chang
role: CEO of Candid; former Chief Innovation Officer at USAID
quote: Innovation is not about solo genius; it's about collective genius.

name: Martine Rothblatt
role: Creator of SiriusXM Satellite Radio.
quote: The greatest thing we can engineer is a positive attitude.
